# HKUpdateFrequency.daily

**Case**

The system launches your app at most once a day in response to changes.

## Declaration

```swift
case daily
```

## Constants

- **HKUpdateFrequency.immediate**: The system launches your app every time it detects a change.
- **HKUpdateFrequency.hourly**: The system launches your app at most once an hour in response to changes.
- **HKUpdateFrequency.weekly**: The system launches your app at most once per week in response to changes.
